definition: down to/up to/to the extent that...
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]

sentences.english: I can't, I can't do this. I'm so excited that I can't eat lunch.
sentences.chinese: 我实在太兴奋了，以至于我都没法吃午餐了。

sentences.english: The wall is so short that they can climb over.
sentences.chinese: 这堵墙矮到如此程度，以至于他们可以爬过去。

sentences.english: She was so sleepy that she ran into a lamppost.
sentences.chinese: 她太困了以至于撞到了路灯杆上。

sentences.english: Transformations are so simple as to be almost trivial.
sentences.chinese: 转换如此简单，以至于有点微不足道。

sentences.english: It's such a heretical idea that it's not even up for discussion.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个如此异端的想法，以至于它根本不会被讨论。

sentences.english: I am sorry. I was too shock to do so.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉，我当时惊吓过度以至于没有留意到。

sentences.english: They should not be left lying around, they are sure to get wrinkled and soiled.
sentences.chinese: 不要随意乱放，以至于弄得又绉又脏。

sentences.english: The movements he made were so comical that I was hard put to it not to laugh.
sentences.chinese: 他作出的动作是如此的滑稽以至于我忍不住大笑。

sentences.english: The reactions of the amygdala are so quick that they are for all intents automatic.
sentences.chinese: 杏仁核的反应是如此之快以至于它们几乎是无意识的。

sentences.english: Answer:1. He made such rapid progress that he passed the exam. 2.
sentences.chinese: 他进步如此的快以至于通过了这次考试。

sentences.english: Water is held so tenaciously that most plant root systems cannot absorb it.
sentences.chinese: 水被牢牢地吸住以至于不能被大多数植物根系吸收。

sentences.english: She is so weak that she can't do this job.
sentences.chinese: 她身体是那么的瘦弱以至于不能做这份工作。

sentences.english: So crowded is this bus that I can hardly breathe.
sentences.chinese: 车上如此拥挤以至于我几乎喘不动气。

sentences.english: It wstipuls a precious moment I didn't wish to move.
sentences.chinese: 那一刻云云珍贵以至于我没有念挪动转移半步。

sentences.english: There are so many bodies that undertakers want to cremate them in groups.
sentences.chinese: 尸体太多了，以至于工作人员得将他们集体火化。

sentences.english: He was such a fan of chewing tobacco that brass spittoons were installed in the White House.
sentences.chinese: 他嗜烟如命，以至于把黄铜质的痰盂都放在白宫。
